page.title: 08The Environment
page.content: The Enviroment Moretonhampstead is surrounded by farmland and moorland.On the outskirts of the parish most of the land is farmed by local farmers.The land is mostly grazed. Cereals are not grown in Moretonhampstead because the land is generally to rough.Industry has not affected Moretonhampstead much over the years .The air has been slightly polluted with the Thompson lorry exhaust fumes and the smoke from the handchime factory.The majority of the people in the town own motor vehicles.Devon General runs a service to Exeter and other big towns.
